info.title: School Management System API
info.description: API documentation for the School Management System

post.description: Authenticate and get a JWT token. The token will be used in the Authorization header for subsequent requests.

password.description: User's password with mixed case, numbers, and symbols

post.description: Logout the authenticated admin and invalidate the token
Add a new class to the system.

post.summary: Add a course to a Class
post.description: Add a course to a class.

class_id.description: Class id that you want to add the course to.

put.description: Update the details of an existing class.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the class to update

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the class to delete

post.description: Add a new course to the system.

instructor_id.description: ID of the instructor teaching the course

is_online.description: Whether the course is online or in-person

schedule_id.description: ID of the schedule associated with the course

schedule_id.description: ID of the schedule associated with the course

parameters.description: ID of the course to delete

post.description: Add a new schedule with specific days and time slots.

end_time.description: End time of the schedule (must be after start_time)

put.description: Update the details of an existing schedule.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the schedule to update

end_time.description: End time of the schedule (must be after start_time)

delete.description: Delete an existing schedule by its ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the schedule to delete

get.description: Retrieve information of a user by their ID and role.
Retrieve user statistics based on role and date range.
Retrieve a list of users by their role.
Retrieve a list of users by their role search bar.

put.description: Update the details of an existing user.
Enable or disable a user's status.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the user to update

get.description: This endpoint returns the details of the currently authenticated user.
